sentence: 85 ||| RESULTS ||| 2.32 ||| Notably, our results failed to detect any significant effect of combined antiplatelet therapy on variable internal mammary artery (IMA) graft occlusion which, because it occurs only rarely, needs a larger sample for statistical power and is probably influenced by factors other than SVG.

sentence: 91 ||| RESULTS ||| 2.38 ||| In conclusion, our results indicate that the combination of aspirin and clopidogrel, acting through different pathways, is more effective on platelet aggregation than aspirin alone, has beneficial effects on vein graft patency and, when administered according to a defined protocol, is safe for bleeding.
